contentclassificationtype.name: Same as parent article
contentclassificationtype.description: The classification is identical to the classification of the directory the piece of content belongs to

contentclassificationtype.name: Visible to all users without restrictions
contentclassificationtype.description: Users can access the piece of content without being authenticated

contentclassificationtype.name: Visible to all users, authentication is mandatory
contentclassificationtype.description: Users can access the piece of content but they need to authenticate

contentclassificationtype.name: Visible to all users, access limited to authorized users only
contentclassificationtype.description: Access groups are associated with the piece of content. Only the members of these groups and the subscribers of the piece of content are granted access. All users know that the piece of content exists

contentclassificationtype.name: Visible and accessible to authorized users only
contentclassificationtype.description: Access groups are associated with the piece of content. Only the members of these groups and the subscribers of the piece of content are granted access. Only these users know that the piece of content exists
